profile-description: I'm a AI & Data Solutions Engineer, I excel in architeching solutions that integrate Web Development, AI, and Data Engineering. Proficient in leveraging modern web technologies, cloud services, and machine learning to drive innovation and efficiency.

about-me.para1: I'm passionate about transforming raw data into AI-driven solutions that drive innovation and efficiency. Whether it's building scalable web applications, engineering robust big data pipelines, or deploying advanced machine learning models, I thrive at the intersection of technology, efficiency, and impact.
about-me.para2: I'm pursuing my Master's in Computer Engineering at New York University, deepening my expertise in Big Data, Machine Learning, and Cloud Computing. Currently, I am actively seeking Summer 2025 internship opportunities in the U.S. to apply my skills in a practical, fast-paced environment while learning from industry leaders.
about-me.para3: Previously, as a Big Data & Backend Engineer at a Data & AI Consulting Firm, I worked with a global media and entertainment giant NBC Universal Media, developing AI-powered chatbots, optimizing ETL workflows, and migrating data pipelines to AWS serverless architecture. As a Co-founder of our innovation initiative (ARCS), I designed smart inventory systems, multilingual translation tools, and led teams to develop real-world tech solutions, mentoring aspiring engineers along the way.
about-me.para4: I love solving complex problems with scalable architectures and intelligent automation. If you're looking for someone who can bridge the gap between data, AI, and software engineering, let's connect!

1.name: Churn Predictor
1.description: A Churn Prediction Machine Learning Pipeline achieving 96.3% accuracy, designed to proactively reduce churn by delivering personalized incentives and targeted offers.

2.name: AI-Powered Intelligent Assistant
2.description: An all-in-one web application leveraging NLP, machine learning, and OpenAI services to enable automated document workflows, intelligent knowledge retrieval, and secure role-based access, enhancing operational efficiency and decision intelligence.

3.name: Metadata-Driven Data Pipeline Manager
3.description: A dynamic web service automating data pipeline orchestration, management, and sharing across Snowflake, S3, Databricks and other data warehouses, enhancing efficiency and scalability.

4.name: Abhishek Agrawal's Portfolio
4.description: A portfolio website built with a modern tech stack, featuring an intuitive interface to showcase my projects, skills, and experiences, with seamless navigation and optimized performance.

5.name: Inventory Manager
5.description: A metadata-driven web application integrated with RFID technology, enabling real-time tracking, automated stock updates, and enhanced security for efficient inventory management.

6.name: Multilingual Transliterator
6.description: A metadata-driven web application integrated with RFID technology, enabling real-time tracking, automated stock updates, and enhanced security for efficient inventory management.
